author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two persons were killed at their residences in a strikingly similar operation close to midnight on Friday. According to police, the killers, armed with deadly weapons, barged into the residence of R. Ravichandran (42) at Vadakku Poygainallur near Nagapattinam and murdered him. In a similar operation, N. Manoharan (34) was killed at Therkku Poygainallur near Velankanni. Previous enmity was suspected to be the motive behind both the murders.

The Velankanni police have arrested three persons – Appu Selvaraman, Ganeshkumar and Karthick — in connection with the case.
title: Two murdered
